title: EatStreet Food Delivery App
description:
Life’s complicated enough without worrying about lunch, dinner, or that hellsbells o’ clock hankering. So think of EatStreet as your full-time food hooker-upper – we fix you up with whatever food delivery and takeout you crave, fast and easy.
Dig into our hunger-solving features:
Eat More, Earn More:
When you order EatStreet, we’ll hook you up with exclusive coupons, restaurant specials and rewards.
A Smorgasbord of Selections:
Order Chinese. Get pizza delivered. Find your favorite sushi and pad thai. No matter what kind of food you crave, we’ve got you covered.
More Payment Options:
Cash or credit? Yes, please. There’s also a little PayPal action in there for your convenience.
Group Ordering & Split the Bill:
Invite friends and start a group order. You can even split the bill so you don't get stuck ponying-up for the "I'll pay you back later" people.
Order Again:
Having deja food? Our Order Again feature makes it ridiculously easy to re-order your favorites.
Order Ahead:
Need food in the future? Place a delivery or takeout order in advance. Your food will be piping hot and ready, right when (and where) you want it to be.
Yelp Reviews:
See what well-fed folks have to say about a restaurant before you start adding items to your order.
Hungry. Happy. EatStreet.

Life’s complicated enough without worrying about lunch, dinner, or that hellsbells o’ clock hankering. So think of EatStreet as your full-time food hooker-upper – we fix you up with whatever food delivery and takeout you crave, fast and easy.

Dig into our hunger-solving features:

Eat More, Earn More:
When you order EatStreet, we’ll hook you up with exclusive coupons, restaurant specials and rewards.

A Smorgasbord of Selections:
Order Chinese. Get pizza delivered. Find your favorite sushi and pad thai. No matter what kind of food you crave, we’ve got you covered.

More Payment Options:
Cash or credit? Yes, please. There’s also a little PayPal action in there for your convenience.

Group Ordering & Split the Bill:
Invite friends and start a group order. You can even split the bill so you don't get stuck ponying-up for the "I'll pay you back later" people.

Order Again:
Having deja food? Our Order Again feature makes it ridiculously easy to re-order your favorites.

Order Ahead:
Need food in the future? Place a delivery or takeout order in advance. Your food will be piping hot and ready, right when (and where) you want it to be.

See what well-fed folks have to say about a restaurant before you start adding items to your order.


Hungry. Happy. EatStreet.
